title: Hunted
description: HUNTEDPeter Steil is a fugitive.A man not only wanted by the US and Swiss authorities, but also by a grieving widow.On the run from justice, he creates a new identity reinventing himself as a helicopter pilot in a small alpine skiing resort and mixing with high society. He has everyone fooled.But not Agent Isabella Ashford. She knows the monster he really is. Her mission is to track him down and make him pay for a series of homicides.Determined to catch the fugitive, she embarks on a game of cat and mouse in a foreign country. He has narrowly evaded capture once. Can Isabella catch and stop him before he kills again?
author: Monique Gliozzi
